articles.title: Police investigating after piece of a pig turns up in Newton park
articles.description:
A 'pig flank' was found off of a trail near Flowed Meadow at the Cove in Auburndale Park, Newton police said.

The post Police investigating after piece of a pig turns up in Newton park appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Newton police are investigating a pig flank found in Auburndale Park.
The piece was discovered near Flowed Meadow off a park trail.
Residents are concerned about safety and potential animal cruelty.

articles.title: Jaylen Brown, Payton Pritchard dominate in blowout win over Lakers: 7 takeaways
articles.description:
Brown finished with a game-high 32 points, but he needed 10-for-28 shooting to accomplish it after starting 3-for-12 in the first half.

The post Jaylen Brown, Payton Pritchard dominate in blowout win over Lakers: 7 takeaways appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Jaylen Brown scored 32 points in the Celtics' victory over the Lakers.
Payton Pritchard contributed significantly, enhancing team performance during the game.
This win boosts the Celtics' morale and playoff positioning in the NBA.

articles.title: These Mass. schools are closed on Monday, Feb. 23
articles.description:
See an updating list of Mass. school districts that are closed for a major snow storm.

The post These Mass. schools are closed on Monday, Feb. 23 appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Massachusetts schools, including Boston, are closed on Monday, Feb. 23 due to a major snowstorm.
Over 100 school districts statewide announced closures, affecting thousands of students and families.
Residents should prepare for travel disruptions and potential power outages from the storm.

articles.title: Fall River police searching for man accused of shooting, killing dog
articles.description:
Kyron Simmons is believed to be armed an dangerous, police said.

The post Fall River police searching for man accused of shooting, killing dog appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Fall River police are searching for Kyron Simmons, accused of shooting a dog.
Simmons is considered armed and dangerous, increasing community safety concerns.
Residents are urged to report sightings to assist in his apprehension.
